product_name: Garmin Vector Replacement Pedal Body and Assembly
long_description: This Garmin Vector Replacement Pedal Body and Assembly works with the Garmin Vector Road Bike Pedal Kit (pedal kit sold separately). Use the Vector Replacement Pedal Body and Assembly to replace damaged pedals. Left and right pedal body assembly are included.
short_description: This Garmin Vector Replacement Pedal Body and Assembly works with the Garmin Vector Road Bike Pedal Kit (pedal kit sold separately).
